# Edit a feature in a new subscription

This task topic explains how to edit a feature in a new subscription by creating a subscription, selecting the feature to edit, and saving your changes.

1.  Create a new subscription and add products to the subscription.
2.  In the Product & Charges section, click Edit for the feature you want to edit. ![EditSubProdFeature](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/7c321c57-7849-4d3e-8b36-de61a6298c39?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..incu2vCyIXri6bUZ_V54Hnve4cli9rnLEYEZkf9pLP4)
3.  In the Edit Feature dialog box, you can edit the Description and any custom fields.
4.  Click save.
